mapper.select: select * from ( select c.name as name, c.discount as discountm, rownum as rn from tblUserCoupon uc inner join tblCoupon c on uc.cseq = c.seq where id =#{id}) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from ( select f.seq as fseq, f.menuname as menuname, (select concat(seq, ext) from tblFoodImage where seq = (select min(seq) from tblFoodImage where fseq = f.seq)) as filename, rownum as rn from tblLikeFood lf inner join tblFood f on lf.fseq = f.seq where id=#{id}) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.delete: delete from tblLikeFood where fseq = #{fseq} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblLikeFood where id=#{id}
select count(*) from tblUserCoupon where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tblUser set tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, addressdetail = #{detail} where id = #{id}
